title: "Machine learning enables discovery of DNA-stabilized silver nanoclusters"
excerpt: "DNA can do more than pass genetic code from one generation to the next. For nearly 20 years, scientists have known of the molecule's ability to stabilize nanometer-sized clusters of silver atoms. Some of these structures glow visibly in red and green,"
